SM2.name: SM-2 Algorithm
SM2.description: Intelligent spaced repetition, dynamically adjusts the optimal review time for each word based on your answers.

LEITNER.name: Leitner
LEITNER.description: Classic flashcard box system. Correct answers move the word to the next level (longer interval), incorrect answers return it to the first level.

main.title: Donation
main.subtitle: Help every rural child grow healthily and make their future shine brightly
main.desc1: In some remote areas surrounded by mountains, quality learning resources are particularly scarce, and children there have limited opportunities to learn about the outside world. They are eager to explore knowledge but face obstacles due to lack of basic textbooks, equipment, and guidance. We hope to pool everyone's efforts to build a bridge to the future for these children.
main.desc2: We only deduct the necessary basic costs to maintain the website's operation, and all remaining donations will be used to support the learning of children in remote areas.

donateNow.title: Donate Now
donateNow.hint: Select your preferred payment method, scan the QR code to complete the donation. All donations will bring substantial help to children in remote areas.

instructions.title: Donation Instructions

instructions.item2: Monthly disclosure of donation revenue and expenditure details to ensure transparency and traceability, subject to public supervision.
instructions.item3: No limit on donation amount; every cent can bring substantial help to children.
instructions.item4: Operating costs are kept to a minimum to maximize public welfare use.

metadata.title: Privacy Policy
metadata.description: Privacy Policy for the iSpell platform.

intro.p1: Thank you for using iSpell! We deeply understand the importance of personal information to you and will do our utmost to protect the security and reliability of your personal information. We are committed to maintaining your trust and adhering to the following principles to protect your personal information: consistency of rights and responsibilities, clear purpose, consent-based choice, minimum necessary usage, security assurance, subject participation, openness, and transparency.
intro.p2: This “Privacy Policy” (hereinafter referred to as “this Policy”) is intended to explain how we collect, use, store, and share your personal information, and how you can access, update, delete, and protect this information.

section1.title: 1. How We Collect and Use Your Information
section1.intro: When you use our services, we adhere to the “minimum necessary” principle and collect and use the following information related to you:

list1.title: Information You Provide
list1.content: When you register an account, you need to provide your **email address** as the login name. When you log in with a password, you need to set a password, and we will store your password using **one-way hash encryption**.

list2.title: Third-Party Service Information
list2.content: If you choose to log in using a third-party account (such as WeChat, QQ, Google, GitHub), you authorize us to obtain publicly registered information from that third-party platform (such as **nickname, avatar**).

list3.title: Service Usage Information
list3.content: To provide the core word memorization function, we will record your **learning data**, including your word book selection, learning plan settings (such as daily word count), word mastery status, and review progress.

list4.title: Device and Technical Information
list4.content: We may automatically collect certain technical information, such as IP address, browser type, and operating system. We use `localStorage` or `sessionStorage` to store your authentication status (using `localStorage` if you select “Remember Me”) and app preferences (such as theme settings).

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.intro: We strictly comply with the provisions of laws and regulations and agreements with users, and use the collected information for the following purposes:

list1.title: Providing Core Services
list1.content: Used for identity verification (login, registration, password reset), and to store and synchronize your learning progress.

list2.title: Sending Important Notifications
list2.content: When you register or reset your password, we need to use your email address to send you a **verification code** through a third-party service provider such as **Tencent Cloud**.

list3.title: Maintenance and Improvement
list3.content: Used to analyze the usage of our services to troubleshoot, improve functionality, and user experience.

list4.title: Security Assurance
list4.content: Used to prevent, detect, and investigate fraud, security threats, illegal acts, or breaches of agreements, policies, or rules with us or our affiliates, to protect your legitimate rights, those of other users, or ours.

section3.title: 3. Sharing, Transfer, and Public Disclosure of Information
section3.p1: We **will not** sell your personal information to any company, organization, or individual.
section3.intro: We will only share your personal information in the following circumstances:

list1.title: With Your Explicit Consent
list1.content: We will share your personal information with other parties after obtaining your explicit consent.

list2.title: Sharing with Authorized Partners
list2.content: Solely for the purpose stated in this Policy, some of our services will be provided by authorized partners (e.g., Tencent Cloud for SMS and email services). We will only share your information for legitimate, proper, necessary, specific, and explicit purposes, and only share the information necessary to provide the service.

list3.title: Legal Requirements
list3.content: We may share your personal information externally based on the requirements of laws, regulations, legal procedures, or mandatory requirements from government authorities.

section4.title: 4. Your Rights
section4.intro: In accordance with relevant Chinese laws, regulations, and standards, we ensure that you exercise the following rights over your personal information:

list1.title: Access and Correction
list1.content: You have the right to access and correct your account information (e.g., nickname, avatar).

list2.title: Deletion
list2.content: You can clear your local device's session information (`sessionStorage`) by “Log Out”. If you checked “Remember Me”, you will also need to manually clear the data in your browser's `localStorage`.

list3.title: Account Deletion
list3.content: You can contact us at any time to request account deletion. Upon receiving your request, we will stop providing services to you and delete or anonymize your personal information (unless otherwise stipulated by laws and regulations).

section5.title: 5. Information Storage and Security
section5.p1: We have implemented industry-standard security protection measures to safeguard the personal information you provide, preventing unauthorized access, public disclosure, use, modification, damage, or loss of data.
section5.p2: For example, we use **Bcrypt hash encryption** to store your **password** in a one-way encrypted format, ensuring that your original password cannot be retrieved even if the database is leaked.

section6.title: 6. Children's Privacy
section6.p1: Our services are primarily intended for adults. Children (whom we consider to be anyone under the age of 14) should not create their own user accounts without the consent of a parent or guardian.

section7.title: 7. Policy Changes
section7.p1: We reserve the right to modify this Policy at any time. The modified Policy will be published on this page and will replace the old version. We recommend that you review this Policy regularly. Your continued use of this service after the Policy has been modified constitutes your acceptance of the modified Policy.

section8.title: 8. Contact Us
section8.p1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us via:

metadata.title: Changelog
metadata.description: Version update records for the iSpell platform, including new features, bug fixes, and performance optimizations.

Changelog.title: Changelog
Changelog.description: See what new improvements we've made

v1_1_2.fix1: Fixed the issue where the bookshelf failed to open when not logged in; now guest users can properly access the bookshelf to browse word book lists.

v1_1_1.fix1: Fixed the issue of delayed feedback after button clicks on the learning page; interaction is now more instantaneous.
v1_1_1.fix2: Fixed display issues with distorted layout on the mistakes collection review page on small screens, optimizing responsive experience.
v1_1_1.fix3: Optimized API error handling logic, fixed issues with some APIs repeatedly reporting errors during unstable network conditions, and enhanced error message readability.

v1_1_0.new1: New 'Mistakes Collection' feature! The system automatically collects your misspelled words, and you can conduct targeted review at any time from the bookshelf.
v1_1_0.refactor1: Optimized 'Learning Plan' experience. When creating or adjusting a plan, you can now click 'View Plan' to preview all words assigned for each day under that plan.
v1_1_0.refactor2: Optimized 'Navigation Structure'. 'System Settings' (e.g., theme, pronunciation source) have been moved to the user avatar menu in the top right, making the main interface cleaner.
v1_1_0.new2: Added 'Feedback' channel. Whether you encounter vocabulary errors, website bugs, or have great feature suggestions, you can let us know through the feedback entry.
v1_1_0.new3: Added 'Donation' page. We pledge that all donations, after deducting necessary operating costs, will be used entirely to support the health and learning of rural children in remote areas.
v1_1_0.new4: Added 'Guest Experience' mode. Unlogged users can now browse all word books and try the platform's basic spelling feature via 'Try Now'.
v1_1_0.fix1: Fixed several known user experience issues and interface display bugs.

v1_0_0.new2: Supports email/password, email verification code, and third-party (GitHub, Google) authentication.
v1_0_0.new3: Implemented spelling and learning modules, including word browsing, plan creation, spelling practice, and intelligent review.
v1_0_0.docs1: Launched 67 English word books, covering all scenarios from student phase to overseas study.
